text: The Lark () is a 1965 Soviet war movie directed by Nikita Kurikhin and Leonid Menaker.Неуловимые танкисты. Плюсы и минусы картины «Т-34»ЖАВОРОНОК (1964) It stars Gennadi Yukhtin, Valeri Pogoreltsev, and Valentins Skulme. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian war movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:1965 war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies about tanks Category:Movies directed by Nikita Kurikhin Category:Movies directed by Leonid Menaker
title: The Lark (1965 movie)
